message: Take it or leave it, Bob! You'll get a better offer if you reject this one.
You'll regret rejecting my chance at 750k!
You're not getting away with 90% of the money that easily, Bob! Meet me in the middle.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm still in control here!
You're not as in control as you think, Bob. Meet me halfway and we can end this.
You're not getting any closer to getting the better deal, Alice. I'm not budging!
